description:
Snow-loving socks to impress everyone with your style choices when you slip your boots off. Full cushioning throughout to keep feet comfortable for long days on skis or a board.

  • 4-Degree Elite Fit System combines two elastics for stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion OTC Socks - Unisex
